name: Borreload Link
text:
You can only use this Skill's second and third effects once per Duel.
1: During this Duel, you can Normal Summon/Set monsters whose sum of ATK and DEF equals 4000 without Tributing, but you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters, except DARK Cyberse or DARK Dragon monsters.
2: Reveal 1 Level 7 or higher Dragon monster in your hand, and then send 2 Level 7 or higher Dragon monsters from your hand and/or Deck to the Graveyard, and add 1 monster whose sum of ATK and DEF equals 4000 from your Deck to your hand. This turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Link Monsters.
3: If a monster is on your opponent's field or in their Graveyard, play 1 Link-2 "Borrel" monster from your Extra Deck to your field.
